title: 有大佬知道怎么自动消除怪物的无敌nbt吗
author: 颅内开灯
txt_content:
本帖最后由 XieLaoDD 于 2020-6-17 21:17 编辑 

我服务器刷新出来的MM怪物可能会刷新无敌nbt的生物
就是生存达不到创造才能打的了的那种
我目前只能用指令来完成消除/entitydata @e[r=2,type=chicken] {Invulnerable:0b}
有没有什么好的办法可以自动解决这类问题

后台中MM有这个报错
[19:18:13 WARN]: [MythicMobs] Task #1264287 for MythicMobs v4.5.9-2586 generated an exception
java.lang.NullPointerException: null
        at io.lumine.xikage.mythicmobs.skills.targeters.MTLivingEntitiesInRadius.getEntities(MTLivingEntitiesInRadius.java:26) ~[?:?]
        at io.lumine.xikage.mythicmobs.skills.SkillMechanic.executeSkills(SkillMechanic.java:312) ~[?:?]
        at io.lumine.xikage.mythicmobs.skills.SkillMechanic.execute(SkillMechanic.java:270) ~[?:?]
        at io.lumine.xikage.mythicmobs.skills.Skill.execute(Skill.java:255) ~[?:?]
        at io.lumine.xikage.mythicmobs.skills.AbstractSkill$DelayedSkill.run(AbstractSkill.java:375) ~[?:?]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:76) ~[spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-dcd1643-e60fc34]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.scheduler.CraftScheduler.mainThreadHeartbeat(CraftScheduler.java:361) [spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-dcd1643-e60fc34]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.MinecraftServer.D(MinecraftServer.java:739) [spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-dcd1643-e60fc34]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.DedicatedServer.D(DedicatedServer.java:406) [spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-dcd1643-e60fc34]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.MinecraftServer.C(MinecraftServer.java:679) [spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-dcd1643-e60fc34]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:577) [spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-dcd1643-e60fc34]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:1.8.0_202]

replies.author: 美味的曲奇
replies.txt_content: 如果能用指令清除可以吧那个指令放命令方块里[循环]+[保持开启]
